rules.title: Allowable extensions to existing encroachments

sections.description: Extension of existing side yard encroachment

qualifiers.scope: Existing walls encroaching into required interior side yard setback

dimensional.extension_distance: Length of the existing wall or 20', whichever is less

mandatory: Existing wall must be at least 5'-0" from the property line

exceptions.special_cases: Only one of the two encroaching walls may be extended

sections.description: Extension of existing front yard encroachment

qualifiers.scope: Existing walls encroaching into required front yard setback

dimensional.extension_distance: No greater than the length of the existing encroaching wall

mandatory: Existing wall must be at least 14'-0" from the property line
Combined length is no greater than one-half the maximum width of the house

sections.description: Extension of existing street-side yard encroachment

qualifiers.scope: Existing walls encroaching into required street side yard setback

dimensional.extension_distance: Length of the existing wall or 20', whichever is less

mandatory: Existing wall must be at least 10'-0" from the property line

notes: Encroaching walls that don’t meet the minimum setback given for each case i.e., 5’, 14’, and 10’, may not be extended nor may they be stepped back and then extended.
Multiple protrusions are not permitted; addition must be contiguous with existing protrusion.
Only for structures that were legally constructed, without a variance or a home improvement exception (HIE).
Only once in the life of the structure.
Requires retention of the non-complying wall.
Exceptions apply to special setbacks as well.

diagram_labels_and_dimensions.interior_side_yard: Side labels on A and B diagrams

text_callouts_within_diagrams.A: Only one of the two encroaching walls may be extended
text_callouts_within_diagrams.B: Length of existing encroaching wall max. and Half the width of the building max.
